00046 using namespace OpenRAVE;
00047 using namespace std;
00048 
00049 class FunctionUserData : public UserData
00050 {
00051 public:
00052     virtual ~FunctionUserData() {
00053     }
00054     boost::python::object simulationfn;
00055 };
00056 
00057 class PythonBindingModule : public ModuleBase
00058 {
00059 public:
00060     PythonBindingModule(EnvironmentBasePtr penv, std::istream&) : ModuleBase(penv) {
00061         SetUserData(UserDataPtr(new FunctionUserData()));
00062     }
00063     virtual ~PythonBindingModule() {
00064         RAVELOG_DEBUG("destroying python binding\n");
00065     }
00066 
00067     virtual bool SimulationStep(dReal fElapsedTime) {
00068         boost::shared_ptr<FunctionUserData> p = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<FunctionUserData>(GetUserData());
00069         bool ret = false;
00070         if( !!p ) {
00071             PyGILState_STATE gstate = PyGILState_Ensure();
00072             try {
00073                 ret = p->simulationfn(fElapsedTime);
00074             }
00075             catch(...) {
00076                 RAVELOG_WARN("unknown exception in python callback, please register again:\n");
00077                 PyErr_Print();
00078                 ret = true;
00079             }
00080             PyGILState_Release(gstate);
00081             if( ret ) {
00082                 GetEnv()->Remove(shared_from_this());
00083             }
00084         }
00085         return ret;
00086     }
00087 };
00088 
00089 boost::shared_ptr<void> g_PythonBindingInterfaceHandle;
00090 
00091 InterfaceBasePtr PythonBindingCreateInterface(EnvironmentBasePtr penv, std::istream& istream)
00092 {
00093     return InterfaceBasePtr(new PythonBindingModule(penv,istream));
00094 }
00095 
00096 InterfaceBasePtr RegisterSimulationFunction(int environmentid, boost::python::object simulationfn)
00097 {
00098     ModuleBasePtr module = RaveCreateModule(RaveGetEnvironment(environmentid), "PythonBinding");
00099     if( !!module ) {
00100         boost::shared_ptr<FunctionUserData> p = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<FunctionUserData>(module->GetUserData());
00101         p->simulationfn = simulationfn;
00102         module->GetEnv()->AddModule(module,"");
00103     }
00104     return InterfaceBasePtr(module);
00105 }
00106 
00107 void Init(UserDataPtr globalstate)
00108 {
00109     RaveInitializeFromState(globalstate);
00110     if( !g_PythonBindingInterfaceHandle ) {
00111         g_PythonBindingInterfaceHandle = RaveRegisterInterface(PT_Module, "PythonBinding", OPENRAVE_MODULE_HASH,OPENRAVE_ENVIRONMENT_HASH, PythonBindingCreateInterface);
00112     }
00113 }
00114 
00115 BOOST_PYTHON_MODULE(orpythonbinding)
00116 {
00117     boost::python::def("Init", Init, boost::python::args("globalstate"), "initializes the python bindings with the openrave global state");
00118     boost::python::def("RegisterSimulationFunction", RegisterSimulationFunction, boost::python::args("environmentid","simulationfn"));
00119 };
